text: The Assessor of the District of Columbia shall furnish information with respect to taxes, special assessments, and valuations to any person having any interest in the property with respect to which such information is requested.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-1310.

1973 Ed., § 47-1009.

Miscellaneous Notes

Office of Assessor abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-413.

DC CODE § 47-1310

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
